mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectDspAbTestSetFlter Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ AB_TEST_SN , SET_TURN , FLTER_GRP_CD , FLTER_CD , ORD_BEG_DT , ORD_END_DT , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM DSP_AB_TEST_SET_FLTER WHERE 1 = 1 AND AB_TEST_SN = #{abTestSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND SET_TURN = #{setTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND FLTER_GRP_CD = #{flterGrpCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND FLTER_CD = #{flterCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
